name: Perfect Pancakes
description: The Perfect Homemade Pancake Recipe is easy to make with ingredients you probably already have on hand. This recipe can easily be turned into a pancake mix or into buttermilk pancakes as well. It's the perfect versatile all-in one recipe.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large mixing bowl, sift together flour, sugar baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
Whisk in milk, eggs, and melted butter just until combined.
Preheat a flat griddle over medium-high heat.
Scoop 1/4 cup of pancake batter onto griddle. Let pancakes cook until bubbles form before flipping.
Cook other side until golden brown. Serve hot with syrup.
